sentences.english: McConnell said Republicans would fight the health-care legislation as hard as they could.
sentences.chinese: 麥康奈爾說，共和黨人將竭盡全力反對健保法案。

sentences.english: Study on Physician Behavior by Case Payment Reimbursement. System under the National …
sentences.chinese: 臺灣全民健保制度下論病例計酬對醫師診療行爲之。

sentences.english: Our current employees will be grandfathered under the existing health insurance.
sentences.chinese: 在現有的健保制度下，目前員工受到保護。

sentences.english: He is not going to give up on that because of one election in Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: 他不會由於麻薩諸塞州的一次選舉而放棄健保改革。

sentences.english: Health insurance and retirement payments are deducted automatically each month.
sentences.chinese: 健保和退休金會每個月自動扣除。

sentences.english: After the introduction of the National Health Insurance, medical quality has become a commonly debated subject.
sentences.chinese: 全民健保實施後，有關醫療服務品質的爭議日多。
